Articles.Content:
Rules:

Every forum member is allowed to participate only once here.

You have to look on the last post and find some reason for giving that poster reputation.

Then give him reputation and post the reason why you gave him the rep.

If you see someone already participated here ignore that post and write as explaination double entry.

Have fun

Eh I really don't know about this, you're not supposed to abuse the rep system and this is wide open for it despite the "Every forum member is allowed to participate only once here" comment.

Hold on while I check.
